mapper.update: update faq_tb set f_step=#{f_step}, f_title=#{f_title}, f_content=#{f_content} where f_num = #{f_num}
update faq_tb set f_delflag = case when f_delflag = 'Y' then 'N' when f_delflag = 'N' then 'Y' end where f_num = #{f_num}
mapper.select: select rownum,f.* from faq_tb f order by f_num desc
select * from faq_tb where f_sysdate between to_date(#{e_start_day},'yy/MM/dd') and to_date(#{e_end_day},'yy/MM/dd')+1 and ${type} like '%' || #{keyword}|| '%' and f_step = #{f_step}
mapper.update: update enjoy_coffee_tb set ad_num=#{ad_num}, ej_title=#{ej_title} ,ej_content=#{ej_content}, ej_img=#{ej_img} where ej_num = #{ej_num}
mapper.select: select * from enjoy_coffee_tb order by ej_num desc
select * from enjoy_coffee_tb where ej_date between to_date(#{e_start_day},'yy/MM/dd') and to_date(#{e_end_day},'yy/MM/dd')+1 and ${type} like '%' || #{keyword}|| '%'
select rownum,ru.*,p.p_name from review_user_tb ru left join product_tb p on p.p_num = ru.p_num where ru_type = #{ru_type}
mapper.update: update review_user_tb set ru_visility = case when ru_visility = '노출' then '숨김' when ru_visility = '숨김' then '노출' end where ru_num = #{ru_num}
update review_user_tb set ru_status = '답변완료' where ru_num = #{ru_num}
update review_user_tb set ru_status = '답변대기' where ru_num = #{ru_num}
